nushi_dragon_0005_friend_02:
So, rumor has it the False Dragon Titan lurks
somewhere in this lake, yeah?[VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_dragon_0005_friend_03:
But not a single person’s ever caught a glimpse
of it.[VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_dragon_0005_friend_04:
Must be some kinda truly terrifying beast...\c
But how are we supposed to search for a thing
when we don’t even know what it looks like?\c
Sure would be handy if it just ran around crying
“I’m the Titan!” or something—if only, right![VAR 0114(0006)]
